message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go as low as $125. How about we meet in the middle at $132.50?
I'm not sure I can meet you at $132.50, but I'm willing to go a bit lower. How about $130?
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $137.50, just like my previous offer?
